title: Analyze Conveyor Vibration Data
description: A reliability engineer analyzes vibration data from a critical conveyor belt's gearbox to detect early signs of a bearing fault.

tasks.description: Download the latest vibration data from the online sensor attached to the conveyor gearbox.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vibration waveform and spectrum data are downloaded.

tasks.description: Analyze the vibration spectrum and identify specific frequencies that correspond to a bearing defect.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis reveals a clear spike in the spectrum at the characteristic frequency for an outer race bearing fault.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order to replace the gearbox bearing during the next planned maintenance shutdown.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created to proactively replace the failing component before it causes a catastrophic failure.
